attributes.action: consider legislation to support left handed people within the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many manufacturers do not cater for gifted people of this country who are left handed we require that the government bring in legislation to end the discrimination towards those who are primarily LEFT HANDED.IT SHOULD BE COMPULSORY TO BE OFFERED LEFT HANDED ALTERNATIVES FOR ALL ITEMS SOLD WITHIN THE U.K.
